text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.D.DE570Copper-bearing intrauterine device (Cu-IUD)Family planning method used - Copper-bearing intrauterine device (Cu-IUD)
    HIV.D.DE571Levonorgestrel intrauterine device (LNG-IUD)Family planning method used - Levonorgestrel intrauterine device (LNG-IUD)
    HIV.D.DE572Etonogestrel (ETG) one-rod implantFamily planning method used - Etonogestrel (ETG) one-rod implant
    HIV.D.DE573Levonorgestrel (LNG) two-rod implantFamily planning method used - Levonorgestrel (LNG) two-rod implant
    HIV.D.DE574DMPA-IMFamily planning method used - DMPA-IM
    HIV.D.DE575DMPA-SCFamily planning method used - DMPA-SC
    HIV.D.DE576NET-EN norethisterone enanthateFamily planning method used - NET-EN norethisterone enanthate
    HIV.D.DE577Progestogen-only pills (POP)Family planning method used - Progestogen-only pills (POP)
    HIV.D.DE578Combined oral contraceptives (COCs)Family planning method used - Combined oral contraceptives (COCs)
    HIV.D.DE579Combined contraceptive patchFamily planning method used - Combined contraceptive patch
    HIV.D.DE580Combined contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR)Family planning method used - Combined contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR)
    HIV.D.DE581Progesterone-releasing vaginal ring (PVR)Family planning method used - Progesterone-releasing vaginal ring (PVR)
    HIV.D.DE582Lactational amenorrhea method (LAM)Family planning method used - Lactational amenorrhea method (LAM)
    HIV.D.DE583Emergency contraceptive pills (ECPs)Family planning method used - Emergency contraceptive pills (ECPs)
    HIV.D.DE584Fertility awareness-based methods (FAB)Family planning method used - Fertility awareness-based methods (FAB)
    HIV.D.DE585Male condomsFamily planning method used - Male condoms
    HIV.D.DE586Female condomsFamily planning method used - Female condoms
    HIV.D.DE587WithdrawalFamily planning method used - Withdrawal
    HIV.D.DE588Female relying on male methodFamily planning method used - Female relying on male method
    HIV.D.DE589Male relying on female methodFamily planning method used - Male relying on female method
    HIV.D.DE590Male sterilizationFamily planning method used - Male sterilization
    HIV.D.DE591Female sterilizationFamily planning method used - Female sterilization
    HIV.D.DE592No methodFamily planning method used - No method

name: FamilyplanningmethodusedCodes
title: Family planning method used Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Family planning method used element
